unnormalised: **Exam Prep Apps: Your Biryani for Test Season?**
normalised: **Exam Prep Apps: Your Biryani for Test Season?**

unnormalised: Feeling the pressure of upcoming exams? Don't sweat it! Exam prep apps are becoming the go-to for students across India, from IIT aspirants in Delhi to final year students in Chennai. Forget those bulky textbooks – now you can revise on your phone while waiting for your mom's amazing Onam Sadhya!
normalised: Feeling the pressure of upcoming exams? Do not sweat it! Exam prep apps are becoming the go-to for students across India, from I I T aspirants in Delhi to final year students in Chennai. Forget those bulky textbooks – now you can revise on your phone while waiting for your mom's amazing Onam Sadhya!

unnormalised: Think of these apps as your personal study gurus. They offer everything from practice tests aligned with CBSE and state board syllabuses to quick revision notes. Many even have video lectures from top educators, so you can understand complex concepts easily.
normalised: Think of these apps as your personal study gurus. They offer everything from practice tests aligned with C B S E and state board syllabuses to quick revision notes. Many even have video lectures from top educators, so you can understand complex concepts easily.

unnormalised: Riya Sharma, a Class 12 student from Jaipur, says, "I was struggling with organic chemistry until I started using 'ExamBuddy'. Now it's a breeze!". Plus, most apps come with performance tracking, so you know exactly where you stand.
normalised: Riya Sharma, a Class twelve student from Jaipur, says, "I was struggling with organic chemistry until I started using 'ExamBuddy'. Now it is a breeze!". Plus, most apps come with performance tracking, so you know exactly where you stand.

unnormalised: Rs. 499 a month could unlock a whole new level of exam confidence. So, ditch the last-minute panic and prep smart. These apps might just be the secret ingredient to acing your exams! Download one today and make like those toppers in Kolkata!
normalised: Rupee four hundred and ninety nine a month could unlock a whole new level of exam confidence. So, ditch the last-minute panic and prep smart. These apps might just be the secret ingredient to acing your exams! Download one today and make like those toppers in Kolkata!
